footer.text: Character Guide • Synergy: Thoma | Update Date: 08/07/2022 | Editor: Luanjo#5886

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Flex options: Kazuha, Sucrose, Heizou

When pairing Thoma with Hu Tao, be wary that you're bringing an additional source of Pyro to your team. As a way to prevent Thoma from interrupting Hu Tao’s Vaporizes, it is recommended to opt for N1C(one Normal Attack followed by a Charged Attack) combos. Xingqiu's C6, Yelan's C2 and/or a Hydro absorbed Elemental Burst from Sucrose or Kazuha can help alleviate this issue.

Yoimiya appreciates ATK% buffs so consider bringing Heizou or Sucrose equipped with Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers over Kazuha.
